entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
